no need cheat sheet anymore

19 Jan 2010

All the time I use cheat sheet to struggle with my bad memory.

  • Rails sheet
  • Postgres sheet
  • Prototype sheet
  • jQuery sheet

No need cheat sheet anymore!!! Cheat Comes.

install
gem install cheat

use
cheat stuff

check all sheets
cheat sheets

need help (about cheat?)
cheat cheat

some examples
cheat mysql
cheat svn
cheat ruby
cheat console

More information
http://cheat.errtheblog.com
